sentences.en: At times like these people turn to Germany, the biggest and most creditworthy economy in Europe.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 各国开始向欧洲经济实力最强,信誉卓著的德国寻求帮助.

sentences.en: Building societies make loans to creditworthy customers.
sentences.cn: 购房互助协会为信誉良好的客户提供贷款。

sentences.en: If we are to enjoy global macro - economic stability, a creditworthy set of countervailing borrowers must emerge.
sentences.cn: 如果要实现全球宏观经济的稳定, 那麽就必须出现一些可信赖的、抵消这些盈馀的借方.

sentences.en: The Fed wants banks to continue to lend to creditworthy borrowers.
sentences.cn: 联邦储备银行想让各家银行继续贷款给信用良好的借款人。

sentences.en: We always say the buyer may not be quite as creditworthy as they thought.
sentences.cn: 我们总对客户说买方信誉没他们想象的那么好.

words.tran_cn: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
好信誉；有资格接受信用贷款
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

trans.tran_cn: 信誉卓著的，有信誉的，资信可靠
trans.tran_en: A creditworthy person or organization is one who can safely be lent money or allowed to have goods on credit, for example, because in the past they have always paid back what they owe
